long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flying Turtle is a fun arcade game where you will help the turtle with the fan in her head collect bubbles and clocks to save time.
Help the turtle fly elevated into the sky! It would be best if you moved back and forth quickly to build momentum to fly faster. Collect bubbled objects to earn points and time bonuses to stop the clock and time from running out. The increased you fly, the better your high score will be. Try to complete the mission in the allotted time. Keep your eyes on the birds and different obstructions to avoid them promptly. Use the arrow keys to fly back and forth if your turtle blocks due to any obstacle.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Flying Turtle  game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
